I would wish for the ability to fly, so I can explore the world and visit places I can only dream of visiting without spending time and money on transportation.
I would wish for the power of telekinesis, so I can move objects with my mind and help people with physical disabilities.
I would wish for unlimited clean, renewable energy sources to end the reliance on fossil fuels and address climate change.
I would wish for the ability to communicate with animals, so I can understand their thoughts and feelings, and build stronger connections with the natural world.
I would wish for the power of time travel, so I can go back in time to witness history, or fix mistakes I made in the past.
